mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( water_info.id, '' ) id, water_info.name, water_info_imageurl.url imageUrl, water_info.water_num waterNum, CONCAT(MIN(cast(guigelist.price as signed)),'') price FROM water_info INNER JOIN type_info ON type_info.water_id = water_info.id INNER JOIN water_type ON type_info.type_id = water_type.id INNER JOIN water_info_imageurl ON water_info_imageurl.water_id = water_info.id INNER JOIN guigelist ON guigelist.water_id=water_info.id WHERE water_info_imageurl.defalut = 1 AND water_type.type = '桶装水' GROUP BY water_info.name ORDER BY id
